title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404 response. This issue can be reproduced by following the steps below:
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it should return an HTTP error 404 response.
SR:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 package from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the server
4. Notice that it returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content instead of an HTTP error 404 response.
